com.cognifide.qa.bb.provider.selenium

Class BobcatWebDriverWait

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cognifide.qa.bb.provider.selenium.BobcatWebDriverWait

  • public class BobcatWebDriverWait
extends Object
    This class performs actual wait. It should always be used with BobcatWait class which acts as a factory for BobcatWebDriverWait.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BobcatWebDriverWait(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver webDriver, long timeOutInSeconds, long defaultTimeout)
      BobcatWebDriverWait instances are constructed by BobcatWait, so this constructor should not be used by the end user.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T until(org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.ExpectedCondition<T> condition)
      This method enhances Selenium's "until" method.
      <T> T until(org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.ExpectedCondition<T> condition, long delay)
      This method enhances Selenium's "until" method.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BobcatWebDriverWait

        public BobcatWebDriverWait(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver webDriver,
                           long timeOutInSeconds,
                           long defaultTimeout)
        BobcatWebDriverWait instances are constructed by BobcatWait, so this constructor should not be used by the end user.
        Parameters:
        webDriver - WebDriver that will be used to create underlying WebDriverWait object.
        timeOutInSeconds - How many seconds to wait before throwing an exception.
        defaultTimeout - Implicit timeout value that will be restored after explicit wait finishes.

    • Method Detail

      • until

        public <T> T until(org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.ExpectedCondition<T> condition)
        This method enhances Selenium's "until" method. First it reduces implicit timeout to a near-zero value. Then a timer is started and the condition is checked cyclically until it is fulfilled or the timer times out. Finally, implicit timeout is set back to the value defined in the property file (under "webdriver.defaultTimeout").
        Type Parameters:
        T - The function's expected return type.
        Parameters:
        condition - Selenium's condition object that is queried cyclically inside the wait loop.
        Returns:
        The functions' return value if the function returned something different. from null or false before the timeout expired.

      • until

        public <T> T until(org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.ExpectedCondition<T> condition,
                   long delay)
        This method enhances Selenium's "until" method. First it reduces implicit timeout to a near-zero value. Then a timer is started and the condition is checked cyclically until it is fulfilled or the timer times out, with delay between checks. Finally, implicit timeout is set back to the value defined in the property file (under "webdriver.defaultTimeout").
        Type Parameters:
        T - The function's expected return type.
        Parameters:
        condition - Selenium's condition object that is queried cyclically inside the wait loop.
        delay - Delay between polls in seconds
        Returns:
        The function's return value if the function returned something different from null or false before the timeout expired.
